lemming.lemma

Class LemmaDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • lemming.data.GenericDao<Lemma>
      • lemming.lemma.LemmaDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDao<Lemma>, ILemmaDao

    public class LemmaDao
extends GenericDao<Lemma>
implements ILemmaDao
    Represents a Data Access Object providing data operations for lemmata.
